casebody.data:
Hillsborough,

June 1, 1909. Concord Iron & Metal Co. v. Couch, Trustee, & a. Replevin, against a trustee in bankruptcy. Transferred from the September term, 1908, of tbe superior court by Wallace, C. J. Martin Howe, for the plaintiffs. Albín Sawyer and Edward Gr. Leach, for the defendants. Per Curiam.

The state courts have no jurisdiction of an action of replevin against a trustee in bankruptcy. Weeks v. Fowler, 71 N. H. 221.

Action dismissed.
